ygData.subject: Another failed attempt in jewelcraft.
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings all, After posting my last list of combinations of jewlery combinations I got several suggestions to try using multiple bars of metal. Some suggested
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings all,

After posting my last list of combinations of jewlery combinations I got several suggestions to try using multiple bars of metal.
Some suggested that it would change the type of jewelry produced.

The following combination,
1 Bar of Silver + 1 Bar of Silver + 1 Malachite =
"Those items did not combine in those quatities to produce anything!"

Yes, I separated the two bars of silver to take up two slots. Perhaps it would work with other stones or maybe other metals, but not with silver and Malachite.
Caio!

Fren
Gnome, Enchanter
Tunare Server
